name: New York City
title: Radical Finance for America’s Schools w/ David I. Backer - MR Online
description: We are joined by David I. Backer, associate professor of education policy at Seton Hall University, to discuss his new book: As Public as Possible: Radical Finance for America’s Schools (The New Press, 2025). The right-wing attack on education has cut deep. In response, millions of Americans have rallied to defend their cherished public schools. Backer’s incisive book asks whether choosing between our embattled status quo and the stingy privatized vision of the right is the only path forward.

name: Education Funding
title: Decorah, Keokuk school boards sign resolution asking for end to vouchers, more public school funding
description: Two school boards in Eastern Iowa have signed resolutions in the past week asking for increased public school funding and an end to school vouchers.

title: Dusty Johnson Unveils “Strong Schools” Plan Focused on Education Funding and Skilled Trades - Mitchell Now
description: Gubernatorial candidate Dusty Johnson announced a new “Strong Schools” education plan in Sioux Falls, outlining proposals to prioritize K-12 funding, boost student achievement, and expand skilled trade pathways.
